### Usage:
```
Rscript -e "rmarkdown::render('making-videos.Rmd',
                              'html_document',
                              clean = TRUE,
                              params = list(api_key=API_KEY))"
```

## Set up the API key

```{r}
Sys.setenv(CONNECT_API_KEY = params$api_key)
```

## Declare slide ID
```{r}
# Google slide ID
id <- "1sFsRXfK7LKxFm-ydib5dxyQU9fYujb95katPRu0WVZk"
```

## Run the conversion!
```{r}
# Run mario!
mario::mario(id,
  voice = "en-US-Wavenet-F",
  output_file = "tester_video.mp4")
```
